languages.english-overview:
HelpDeskZ is a FREE and Open Source help desk solution for your business. It is easily integrated to your site and support requests can be created via email or web-based forms.
It will give you a friendly interface for your site's tickets management. You can create a wide knowledge base for your customers and with the opportunity to create Canned Responses for the most popular requests, your will improve your support sytem productivity. In resume, powerful, easy to use, reliable, open source and FREE.
HelpDeskZ is released under GNU General Public License.

ul.li: Custom fields to have additional information
Login-Share system to integrate your help desk to third-party applications
Allow the use of SEO-friendly URLs
